metadata.title: CVE-2020-25739 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the gon gem before gon-6.4.0 for Ruby. MultiJsondoes not honor the escape_mode parameter to escape fields as an XSSprotection mechanism. To mitigate, json_dumper.rb in gon now does escapingfor XSS by default without relying on MultiJson.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25739` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-gon - 6.1.0-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-gon package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
